title: The Good, The Bad, and the League: 5/2 - 5/8
body:
_Your weekly dose of server problem-os, NA League news, and other!_

The League Client is (almost done) moving to a new storage design (making your local install better), MSI is moving into the group stage (Still way early in the morning), and [Lux has a new comic series](https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/comic/lux/issue-1/0/) starting! 

**Follow-Ups:**

* **Mac voice still not working properly** Reached out to Apple for assistance (Pinging Rioters for more updates). 

**Server Stuff: **

* **MSI orbs disabled (5/2, ~1 day)** A global error in the client with MSI orbs required them to be disabled. Once a fix was pushed to live, MSI orbs were re-enabled. 

* **Client video has unavailable video (5/4, ~3 hours)** An article pushed live in the client linked to a Youtube video with private permissions. Needless to say, no one could watch it until the video was set to public (and the rest of this sentence was copy/pasted back). 

**Game Stuff: **

* **One rack of game servers experiencing lag (5/2, ~1 day)** Player reports filter in detailing laggy games. Investigation doesnâ€™t find ISP or other issues that could cause it. Suspected server rack is disabled and pushed into diagnostic mode. After finding no issues, a reboot and test games show no lag, so the rack is pushed back into the pool for live games. Classic case of turning it on and off again, we suppose.

* **One game server failing to respond (5/7, ~13 minutes)** A game server fails to respond to a kill command for maintenance. Engineers directly connect to the problematic server and force end all processes before resuming the maintenance list. 

**Player Support Issues:**

A gentle PSA! If there have been any  modifications made to your account, please check your email attached to your account (including spam) first in case itâ€™s from us.  It will help with understanding  why which can help speed up the overall support process and help start the conversation without you needing to ask â€˜what the heck is going on?â€™ 

_Morgageddon & Couch Commando_
